item_prototype.name: TotalMessageCount per minute for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of unacknowledged messages on the broker per minute

item_prototype.name: AverageEnqueueTime for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Average time a message has been held this destination

item_prototype.name: ConsumerCount for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers subscribed to this destination.

item_prototype.name: DequeueCount per minute for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of messages per minute that have been acknowledged (and removed from) from the destination.

item_prototype.name: EnqueueCount per minute for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of messages per minute that have been sent to the destination.

item_prototype.name: ExpiredCount per minute for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of messages per minute that have been expired.

item_prototype.name: ProducerCount for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of producers publishing to this destination

item_prototype.name: QueueSize for {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_DESTINATIONNAME} at {#JMXOBJ_ATTR_BROKERNAME}
item_prototype.description: Number of messages in the destination which are yet to be consumed. Potentially dispatched but unacknowledged.
